title: The Weapon Hunter Series 1 6of6 Flamethrowers 720p x264 AAC HDTV
description:
The Weapon Hunter: Series 1

War Documentary hosted by Paul Shull, published by Smithsonian Channel in 2015 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/2/23/The-Weapon-Hunter-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

The Weapon Hunter: Series 1 
A shootout between five WWII sniper rifles and two Civil War cannons. A massive rebuild of a tank destroyer and the fierce Quad 50 mobile machine gun. An epic cross-continent hunt for an ultra-rare rifle and an operational flamethrower. Military history buff Paul Shull is on a mission to touch, hold, and fire some of the greatest pieces of weaponry on the planet. Get an up-close look at some of the most iconic weapons of the last 150 years and witness the awesome firepower they still have.




6)  Flamethrowers 
The flamethrower is one of the most terrifying weapons in existence, capable of launching a 2,200-degree wall of fire over 100 feet. The U.S. military stopped using them in 1978, and today only a few remain, and even fewer can safely be fired. If host Paul Shull finds one, will he properly use it? Follow him as he calls upon the world's leading flamethrower experts on what could be his most dangerous quest ever. Then watch as he gets a firsthand lesson in how to fire the devastating machine that helped turn the tide of World War II.
